Title: Hell
Plot: Tommy and Janet are brought together once again by another Gavin family tragedy. Jerry ends up not showing up for work. Mike decides it is time to look for some advice about his sexuality. Meanwhile, Maggie has a  surprise for Sean.
GuestStars: Phil Esposito,  Stuart  Evered,  Jennifer Ferrin,  Susan Misner,  Marjan Neshat,  Sherri Saum,  Bill Sorice,  Robert Sciglimpaglia,  Manny Perez,  Deanne Bray,  Bill Belichick
